title: Bump minimist from 1.2.0 to 1.2.5 in /gpii-service

nodes.bodyText: Could one of the admins verify that these changes are reasonable to test? If so, please reply with "ok to test".

Another one-off failure - "Timed out waiting for the SPI call to complete (see GPII-2001)"
ok to test
Looks like minimist is up-to-date now, so this is no longer needed.
